a.n: Mavericks/Spurs, 2006 Western Conference Semifinals - Game 7 - Popcast

p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Tim Duncan led all scorers with 41 points but it wasn't enough to overcome Dirk Nowitzki, 37 points, and the Dallas Mavericks who beat the Spurs 119-111 in overtime to win the 2006 Western Conference semifinals.
